login.container: min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-400 via-blue-600 to-indigo-700 flex items-center justify-center p-4
login.card: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-2xl p-10 w-full max-w-md border border-blue-100
login.title: text-4xl font-extrabold text-blue-800 tracking-tight
login.subtitle: text-blue-600 mt-2 text-lg

kiosk.header: flex-none bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-700 via-indigo-600 to-purple-600 text-white py-6 px-8 shadow-lg
kiosk.shell: h-screen flex flex-col bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-50 to-white
kiosk.input: text-center text-3xl tracking-widest px-6 py-6 rounded-2xl border-4 border-blue-500 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-blue-400 outline-none w-full max-w-xs bg-white shadow-lg
kiosk.button: w-full max-w-xs py-4 bg-blue-700 text-white rounded-2xl text-xl font-bold shadow-lg hover:bg-indigo-700 transition
kiosk.userCard: w-full max-w-xs mx-auto bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg border border-blue-200 p-6 mt-4 flex flex-col items-center

admin.header: bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-700 to-blue-700 text-white py-6 px-8 shadow-lg
admin.card: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-xl p-8 border border-gray-100
admin.title: text-3xl font-bold text-indigo-800 mb-2
admin.subtitle: text-gray-600 mb-4

sidebar.navButton: w-full px-6 py-3 flex items-center justify-between hover:bg-indigo-700 transition
sidebar.submenuButton: w-full px-6 py-2 pl-14 text-left text-sm hover:bg-indigo-700 transition flex items-center justify-between
